query:
INSERT INTO email_verifications (email, link_token_hash, code, expires_at)
			VALUES ($1, $2, $3, NOW() + ('1 min'::interval * $4))
			ON CONFLICT (email)
			DO UPDATE SET
			    link_token_hash = $2,
			    code = $3,
			    expires_at = NOW() + ('1 min'::interval * $4),
			    attempts = 0
			WHERE
			    email_verifications.expires_at < NOW()
